attributes.action: Stop The Premier League From Playing Games Internationally
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is just about the worst idea I have ever heard of.  We as fans pay £1000's of pounds each year to just support our club and now they want to move games abroad.  Well if this happens this will be the death of football in this country.  There's already too much money in football already.  Fans are already disillusioned with their clubs already this will make many of them turn away.  

This is not the NFL with Franchise's, these are football clubs which we have supported for most our lifes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
